title: Refund
10.1: 1. The return of the goods to the Online store is made according to the rules return of this agreement.
10.2: 2. The return of the goods to the Online store is made at the expense of the Buyer.
10.3: 3. When the Buyer returns the goods of proper quality, The online store returns to him the amount of money paid for the goods by the fact of the return of the goods minus the compensation of the costs of the online store related to the delivery of the goods to the Buyer, if any.
